## bootstrap package

[Angular schematics](https://angular.io/guide/schematics) used to add bootstrap to an application.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addBootstrap(options)](./bootstrap.addbootstrap.md) | Adds SDK support to an existing Angular application |
